flawed_nl_solution:
Of the males with stripes, 10% are babies because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=10>>10
There are 40 males with stripes because 4 / 0.1 = <<4/0.1=40>>40
There are 160 males because 40 / (1/4) = <<40/(1/4)=160>>160
Males make up 40% of the pond's total, because 100 - 60 = <<100-60=40>>40
There are 400 turtles in total 160 / 0.4 = <<160/0.4=400>>400
#### 400

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 40, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
